title: Having issue in posting to find a team or duo in Team Recruitment
body:
Hey guys C0rruptlion here and was looking on boards and found team recruitment and people looking for team comm, etc but i cant post my info to these people on boards because it says i need to be lvl 6 or higher and im lvl 15 plz help and thanks for your time

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: An account may need to sync with the boards when they're posting for the first  time.  It seems that your post here has made that update.  Everything should be okay now, but let me know if you have any issue posting!
hey it worked when i posted here WOOT THANKS
